duties.duty: Control over the observance of the rule of law at the enterprise, protection of its interests.
Representation of the interests of the association in courts, controlling and law enforcement bodies, state bodies, enterprises, institutions and organizations.
Control over the work of the legal department.
Control over the observance of the rule of law at the enterprise, protection of its interests.
Management of legal work at the enterprise.

Analysis of internal documents and business operations of the enterprise, its counterparties (individuals and / or legal entities) for compliance with applicable law, bringing documents in line with current legislation.
